lead_paragraph: Carlos Berlocq put aside his poor form in quarterfinals at the Croatia Open to defeat third-seeded Jeremy Chardy of France 6-4, 6-2.

headline.print_headline: Berlocq, Elias Advance to Croatia Open Semifinals
headline.main: Berlocq, Elias Advance to Croatia Open Semifinals
